document_data.caption: Adventurers in a swamp about to contract swamp fever.
document_data.name: Swamp Fever
document_data.mainbody: '''Swamp fever''' was a common mosquito-borne [[disease]] encountered in the swamps, wetlands, and nearby areas.<ref name="WoA /><ref name="drag />
document_data.Acquisition: The disease was spread by blood-drinking, stinging, and biting insects found in swamps, such as [[mosquito]]es, [[leech]]es, and other vermin. The disease was also common in the [[Mortik Swamp]] of the [[Shining South]] the areas around the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]],
document_data.Effects: Swamp fever had a chance of rendering the affected individual unresponsive. Those with more formidable constitutions had a higher chance of resisting the disease, while weaker individuals collapsed in a weak state, unable to move until cured.<ref name="WoA /> The incubation time varied depending on the person, but on average, it was 12 hours. The most common symptoms of swamp fever were: muscle fatigue, nausea, and, of course, fever. The longer it remained untreated, the weaker the afflicted individual became.<ref name="drag />
document_data.History: Some years before the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the mother of [[Shandra Jerro]] â€“ a one-time companion of the Knight-Commander, perished of a bad case of swamp fever. Shandra could not do anything about her mother's condition and had to just let her wither away. The farmer woman turned adventurer shared that memory with the Knight-Commander while they traveled together in 1374 DR.
